model.level.collision

Interface HeroCollision

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Collision
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    HeroCollisionImpl

    public interface HeroCollision
extends Collision
    This class models all the hero's collision with other game elements.

    • Method Summary

      Checks the collision with the open door.
      boolean powerUpCollision(java.util.Set<Tile> powerUpSet)
      Checks if there's a collision with a powerup.

        Checks the collision with the open door.
